text: James Mountain "Jim" Inhofe (November 17, 1934 â€“ July 9, 2024) was an American politician from Oklahoma. He was a U.S. senator of Oklahoma from 1994 to 2023. In February 2022, Inhofe said he would retire in January 2023. Inhofe died of problems caused by a stroke at a hospital in Tulsa, Oklahoma on July 9, 2024, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Official U.S. Senate Site Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Businesspeople from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:American aviators Category:American mayors Category:American Presbyterians Category:Politicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Politicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:United States representatives from Oklahoma Category:United States senators from Oklahoma Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Jim Inhofe
